name: Lloyd Doggett
tweet_text: I was in my office overlooking the Capitol that day and saw the desecration of our Capitol. Lives were lost; at least 140 Capitol police officers were injured.

name: Lloyd Doggett

tweet_text:
üì∑ above #1: The Capitol rotunda, January 6, 2021, as captured by photographer Mostafa Bassim with Getty Images.

And we must recommit to the hard work required to strengthen and safeguard our democracy, which is neither invincible nor inevitable.
